value.description: Build a shuttle which can be used for long distance travel or to reach orbit. This requires a shuttle engine which can be fabricated at a fabrication bench, bought from orbital traders, salvaged from other shuttles, or obtained through quests.

An engine capable of powering a small shuttle. Shuttle engines can usually only be manufactured in large specialized factories, making them rare on the rim. It may be possible to replicate this process at a fabrication bench.
